entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Kemptville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:28 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -4.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Kemptville 6:00 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
Temperature: -4.5°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.3 kPa falling
Humidity: 57 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -11.8°C
Wind: ENE 6 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this evening. Snow at times heavy beginning late this evening. Amount 10 cm. Wind east 20 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early in the evening then partly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 7. Wind chill minus 5 in the evening and minus 10 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Friday 03 March 2023
